summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-provider football API system with football-data.org integration and admin panel API management. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend displays matches with team logos and competition names, admin authentication successful.

design_issues.issue: Tab navigation and league filter selectors not found with expected CSS classes
Leaderboard page shows loading state but may need additional time to fully render

passed_tests: Backend health check /api/health returns 200
Football competitions /api/football/competitions returns 8 leagues
Football matches /api/football/matches returns matches with total > 0 (67 matches)
Football matches today /api/football/matches/today returns CL matches with total >= 4
Football ended matches /api/football/matches/ended returns matches with scores
Football live matches /api/football/matches/live returns valid JSON
Football leaderboard /api/football/leaderboard returns users key
Competition filter /api/football/matches/competition/PL returns Premier League matches
Competition filter /api/football/matches/competition/CL returns CL matches
Competition filter /api/football/matches/competition/PD returns La Liga matches
Admin login POST /api/auth/login with admin credentials succeeds and returns session_token cookie
Admin list APIs GET /api/admin/system/apis returns Football-Data.org config
Admin validate key POST /api/admin/system/apis/validate with valid football-data.org key returns valid:true
Frontend homepage loads with match cards showing team names and crests
Frontend login page /login loads and authentication works
Frontend shows matches in grid/list view with team logos
Match cards show competition name (UEFA Champions League), teams, dates, and vote buttons
View mode toggle (Grid/List) works correctly
WebSocket live updates active
Admin user logged in successfully (Level 4 admin visible)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Core functionality working, minor selector issues with tabs/filters
